page.title: 02TATTERSHALL CASTLE
page.content: OF A 15TH CENTURY HUNTING LODGE;TATTERSHALL CASTLE,A FEW MILES TO THE SOUTH;OR THE RUINS OF KIRKSTEAD ABBEY,A 12TH CENTURY CISTERCIAN ABBEY AND ITS LAY CHAPEL,THE CHURCH OF ST.LEONARD,WHICH IS STILL INTACT AND STILL USED FOR WORSHIP. SUPERB HOTEL OR SELF_CATERING ACCOMMODATION IS AVAILABLE IN PLENTY AND AS WELL AS ITS AMENITIES,WOODHALL SPA IS AN EXCELLENT TOURING CENTRE FOR THE REST OF THE COUNTY WITHIN EASY REACH OF THE LINCOLNSHIRE WOLDS,AN AREA OF OUTSTANDING NATURAL BEAUTY AND THE COUNTY TOWN OF LINCOLN.
